original_text: And Herod and Pilate became friends with each other that very day, for before this they had been at enmity with each other.
korean_text: 헤롯과 빌라도가 전에는 원수였으나 당일에 서로 친구가 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Herod and Pilate became friends with each other
for before this they had been at enmity with each other
